About Me

I am Kshiraj Kunta, a dedicated and passionate Software Engineer with a strong foundation in full-stack development, cloud technologies, and automation. Currently pursuing my Master's in Computer Science at California State University, Chico.

My expertise spans across modern web technologies, cloud platforms, and AI-driven applications. I thrive on creating scalable solutions that make a real impact.
